name: Crocodile
types: The Seven Warlords of the Sea / Baroque Works
text:
On Play DON!! -2 If your Leader's type includes (Baroque Works), place up to 1 card from the top of your deck on top of your Life.
When opponent attack Once Per Turn DON!! -1 Draw 1 Card and Trash 1 Card From Your Hand.

effect.text: If your Leader's type includes (Baroque Works), place up to 1 card from the top of your deck on top of your Life.
Draw 1 Card and Trash 1 Card From Your Hand.

meta.notes: Rarity is 'C' as printed in the bottom right corner. The card is a Character with Strike attribute and Purple color. The text is fully extracted from the card image.
